parameters.query:
=SELECT 
  cs.*,
  cf.email,
  cf.nom,
  cf.prenom,
  cf.raison_sociale
FROM client_subscriptions cs
JOIN client_finals cf ON cs.client_final_id = cf.id
WHERE cs.id = '{{ $json.subscriptionId }}'::uuid
  AND cs.statut = 'actif';

=UPDATE client_subscriptions
SET 
  date_prochain_renouvellement = '{{ $json.newRenewalDate }}'::timestamptz,
  updated_at = NOW()
WHERE id = '{{ $json.subscription.id }}'::uuid
RETURNING *;

=INSERT INTO invoices (
  id,
  tenant_id,
  client_final_id,
  numero_facture,
  date_emission,
  date_echeance,
  montant_ht,
  montant_ttc,
  statut,
  description,
  updated_at
) VALUES (
  gen_random_uuid(),
  '{{ $node['02. Parser payload'].json.tenantId }}'::uuid,
  '{{ $json.invoice.clientFinalId }}'::uuid,
  'INV-' || TO_CHAR(NOW(), 'YYYYMMDD') || '-' || LPAD(FLOOR(RANDOM() * 10000)::TEXT, 4, '0'),
  '{{ $json.invoice.dateEmission }}'::timestamptz,
  '{{ $json.invoice.dateEcheance }}'::timestamptz,
  {{ $json.invoice.montant }},
  {{ $json.invoice.montant * 1.20 }},
  '{{ $json.invoice.statut }}',
  '{{ $json.invoice.description }}',
  NOW()
)
RETURNING *;
